title: Peppermint Chocolate Chip Mousse
directions: In a large mixing bowl combine pudding mix and milk; whisk for 2 minutes. Chill in refrigerator for 5 minutes, until soft soft.
In a separate bowl mix together peppermint extract and Cool Whip. Fold Cool Whip and chocolate chips into pudding.
Cover and chill until serving time. Serve in individual dishes garnishing with extra whipped topping and chocolate syrup.
